channel.title: Does the normal client not the web client work on vista?
channel.description: hi and i was wondering cause the normal client not the web one cause when i start it plays fine for 5 seconds and then it closes. i noticed lots of people were having the same issue as i did. so i was wondering does mopar work on vista??? (for noobs who dont know what vista is its the new windows oprerating system and windows xp is going to be discounted sometime in 2008 dont argure if its going to be discounted or not.) so please tell me if u know if mopar normal client works on vista or not. :)[br][size=1]Posted on: July 18, 2007, 04:27:00 PM[/size][hr]please help!!

item.title: Does the normal client not the web client work on vista?
item.dc:creator: @milktree milktree
item.description:
@milktree wrote:

im going to try dual booting with my pc. you can have vista and xp on ur pc at the same time. you just have to choose when you startup ur pc

Read full topic

item.title: Does the normal client not the web client work on vista?
item.dc:creator: @Zaron Zaron
item.description:
@Zaron wrote:

ugh… vista has a bun ch of glitches and bugs in it atm… i would of stuck with XP untill 2008 or 2009… these problems will happen alot like your java stopping (which makes your webclient or client freeze) and other stuff… If you have an XP computer in your house, it’s best to use that right now untill more Vista updates come to stop the glitching on some programs.

the person who said get a mac…

Macs totally suck for server building… i would prefer a mac for anything besides coding because you sometimes need other programs that you need for mac to run all the stuff to have a normal server… And, for me, macs just stall up/Crash alot… (idk bout you, but they do for me…)

Read full topic
